label: Station ID
description: Sequential number assigned to each record in the EWM_STATION table. Database unique identifier (key).

label: Site Code
description: Location based 18 character alphanumeric code assigned to each well. Database alternate unique identifier (key).

label: Top Perforation (feet bgs)
description: Depth of the top of screen interval as measured in positive feet below ground surface

label: Bottom Perforation (feet bgs)
description: Depth of the bottom of screen interval  as measured in positive feet below ground surface
